name: Battle for the body
description:
DISCLAIMER, READ THE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PLAYING.

little blood cell, all alone. Little blood cell, defending his home. little blood cell, of great valor. killing the viruses, he does not cower. little blood cell will keep on defeating, giving it his all to keep the two hearts beating!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Left mouse click to shoot.

Instructions:

Collect white blood cells(White spheres with eyes) to gain health.

Shoot and avoid viruses(Big green enemies that follow the player).

I hope you enjoy the game.

The making of this game:
